Career Profile¶

I’m a Software Developer, most of the time I work on software applications backend, mostly with Python and Java.

I have 15 years of experience in designing and implementing complex and distributed software systems. Also I have a basic knowledge in Linux administration/DevOps and work with Kubernetes/Docker.

Sometime back I had also worked on frontend, most of the time with BackboneJS.

I have also spent a significant amount of time contributing to opensource software development (predominantly Openstack). Played the role of an active developer and core reviewer in subprojects, like Sushy and Proliantutils, of OpenStack Ironic (Baremetal server provisioning) project.

Moreover I started my career with C++ and had spent my initial days of my career (around 6 years) with it.

I also have a bit of experience in mobile development with Android.

In brief, I am an Opensource enthusiast and I like building cool stuff!

Experiences¶

  • 2019 - now - Principal Member Technical Staff at Oracle

  • 2015 - 2019 - System Software Engineer V at HPE (Hewlett Packard Enterprise)

  • 2011 - 2015 - Senior Software Developer at Perceptive Software (now Hyland)

  • 2010 - 2011 - System Software Engineer III at HP (Hewlett Packard)

  • 2008 - 2010 - Senior Software Specialist at Infosys

  • 2007 - 2008 - Software Developer at GoldenSource

  • 2005 - 2007 - Software Engineer at Patni
